name: Divided by Cardboard
description:
A couch co-op game where you need to communicate with your friend in order to together collect all of the magical tacos!

Attn! Do it like in the good  old school and divide the screen with a piece of cardboard. You shouldn't peek on your partner!

Made during Castle Game Jam 2018. by Johannes, Olle, Mikko, Sassa and Karim #castlegamejam
